August 02, 2016  

hit fit video

As well as having an hours Muay Thai training I am also doing a HIT FIT cardio class to boost my workouts.

They are run by Take Action Personal Training and are really good fun and an excellent workout.

I am not that impressed with my technique in this session/video as such but its more about fun and cardio after already doing special training.

Here is a video from the You Tube channel

Enjoy!
